Module universityProject
Package usersPackage

Class AcademManager

java.lang.Object
usersPackage.User
usersPackage.Employee
usersPackage.Manager
usersPackage.AcademManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<User>, CanViewAcademicInfo, Observer
public class AcademManager extends Manager implements CanViewAcademicInfo
The AcademManager class represents a manager with academic-related responsibilities and the ability to view academic information. It extends the Manager class and implements the CanViewAcademicInfo interface.
